biotools.summary: The Arabidopsis Coexpression Tool (ACT) is based on the coexpression analysis of 21273 Arabidopsis thaliana genes from gene pair correlation data of 3500 Affymetrix Arabidopsis ATH1 Genome Array Chip microarray samples.

bioschemas.name: Arabidopsis Co-expression Tool (ACT)
bioschemas.summary: The Arabidopsis Coexpression Tool (ACT) is based on the coexpression analysis of 21273 Arabidopsis thaliana genes from gene pair correlation data of 3500 Affymetrix Arabidopsis ATH1 Genome Array Chip microarray samples.
